# RevenueHunt Documentation

> Comprehensive documentation for RevenueHunt's product recommendation quiz platform, including setup, customization, integrations, troubleshooting, and customer success strategies.

This site is built with [MkDocs](https://www.mkdocs.org/) using the Material theme. The documentation is organized into Tutorials, How-to Guides, an App Manual (Reference), and Customer Success resources. Each section below lists key guides and references to help users get started, customize, and optimize their RevenueHunt experience.

Note: Some external links point to our [Blog](https://revenuehunt.com) (revenuehunt.com) rather than the documentation site (docs.revenuehunt.com).

## Getting Started & Tutorials
- [Docs Home](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/): Main landing page for the documentation.
- [Tutorials Overview](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/tutorials/): Introduction to tutorials.
- [App Tour](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/tutorials/getting-started/): Guided tour of the app.
- [Making your First Quiz](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/tutorials/making-first-quiz/): Step-by-step guide to creating your first quiz.
- [Recommending a Skincare Routine](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/tutorials/skincare-routine/): Example use case.
- [Building a Skin Type Quiz](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/tutorials/skintype-quiz/): Tutorial for creating a skin type quiz.
- [Quiz Design](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/tutorials/quiz-design/): Comprehensive quiz design tutorial.
- [Sending Emails](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/tutorials/sending-emails/): How to send emails from your quiz.
- [Send follow-up emails with Klaviyo](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/tutorials/follow-up-emails-klaviyo/): Integration tutorial.
- [Using Conditional Logic](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/tutorials/conditional-logic/): How to add logic to your quizzes.
- [Shopify Markets](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/tutorials/shopify-markets/): Working with Shopify Markets in quizzes.
- [One Minute Tutorials Playlist](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/tutorials/playlist-one-minute-tutorials/): Quick video guides.

## How-to Guides
- [How-to Guides Overview](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/): Index of all how-to guides.
- **Getting Started:**
  - [Install App](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/install-app/): Installation instructions.
  - [Create Your First Quiz](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/create-first-quiz/): Quick start for new users.
  - [Contact Customer Support](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/contact-customer-support/): How to get help.
  - [Use Quiz Copilot](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/use-quiz-copilot/): AI-powered quiz building assistant.
- **Quiz Design & Customization:**
  - [Customize Quiz Design](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/customize-quiz-design/): Design customization options.
  - [Add & Adjust Images](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/add-adjust-images/): How to add and adjust images in your quiz.
  - [Change Quiz Language](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/change-quiz-language/): Localization guide.
  - [Change Quiz Currency](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/change-quiz-currency/): Currency settings.
  - [Edit the Results Page](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/edit-results-page/): Results page customization.
  - [Use Markdown Language](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/use-markdown/): Using markdown in quizzes.
  - [Set Multiple Result Pages](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/set-multiple-result-pages/): Multiple results configuration.
  - [Use Information Recalls](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/use-information-recalls/): Recall information in quizzes.
  - [Join Questions](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/join-questions/): Combine questions.
  - [A/B Test Your Quiz](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/ab-test-quiz/): Run A/B tests.
- **Product Recommendations:**
  - [Recommend Products](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/recommend-products/): Product recommendation setup.
  - [Set Up Recommendations](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/set-up-recommendations/): Configure recommendations.
  - [Set Up Fixed Recommendations Quiz](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/set-up-fixed-recommendations-quiz/): Configure fixed product recommendations.
  - [Set Up Funnel Quiz](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/set-up-funnel-quiz/): Build a sales funnel quiz.
  - [Set Up Scoring Quiz](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/set-up-scoring-quiz/): Create a scoring-based quiz.
  - [Recommend Subscription Products](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/recommend-subscription-products/): Subscription product recommendations.
  - [Recommend Slots (Skincare Routine)](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/recommend-skincare-routine-slots/): Slot-based recommendations.
  - [Recommend Product Matrix](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/recommend-product-matrix/): Matrix-based recommendations.
  - [Recommend Products Based on Numerical Inputs](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/recommend-products-based-on-numerical-inputs/): Use numerical inputs for recommendations.
  - [Recommend Products Based on Number of User Choices](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/recommend-products-based-on-number-of-user-choices/): Recommendations based on choice count.
  - [Only Recommend Products with Minimum Votes](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/only-recommend-products-with-minimum-votes/): Set minimum vote threshold.
  - [Always Recommend the Same Product](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/always-recommend-the-same-product/): Configure default product recommendations.
  - [Filter Recommendations by Price](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/filter-recommendations-by-price/): Filter products based on price ranges.
  - [Hide Out-Of-Stock Products](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/hide-out-of-stock-products/): Exclude unavailable products.
  - [Hide Product Variants](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/hide-product-variants/): Exclude variants.
  - [Add Product Metafields](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/add-product-metafields/): Use metafields in recommendations.
  - [Add Products to Google Product Feed](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/add-products-gpf/): Google Product Feed integration.
  - [Show Product Reviews](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/show-product-reviews/): Display product reviews in quiz results.
  - [Troubleshoot Quiz Results](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/troubleshoot-product-results/): Troubleshooting guide.
- **Quiz Logic & Advanced Features:**
  - [Use Conditional Logic](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/use-conditional-logic/): Advanced quiz logic.
  - [Use Jump Logic](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/use-jump-logic/): Skip to specific questions based on answers.
  - [Use Skip Logic](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/use-skip-logic/): Skip questions conditionally.
  - [Use Display Logic](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/use-display-logic/): Show/hide content based on conditions.
  - [Hide Content with Logic](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/hide-content-with-logic/): Conditional content display.
  - [Add JavaScript](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/add-javascript/): Custom JS in quizzes.
  - [Add Discount](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/add-discount/): Discount setup.
  - [Use Callback Function](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/use-callback-function/): Callback integration.
  - [Pass Parameters to Pre-Fill Quiz Responses](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/pass-parameteres-to-fill-quiz-responses/): Pre-fill quiz answers.
  - [Show Results Explanation](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/show-results-explanation/): Explain quiz results.
- **Publishing & Display:**
  - [Publish the Quiz on Your Website](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/publish-quiz/): Embed quizzes.
  - [Publish Quiz as Inline](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/publish-quiz-inline/): Embed quiz inline on a page.
  - [Publish Quiz as Popup](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/publish-quiz-automatic-popup/): Display quiz as automatic popup.
  - [Publish Quiz as Link](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/publish-quiz-link/): Share quiz as a standalone link.
  - [Publish Quiz as External Link](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/publish-quiz-external-link/): Create external quiz link.
  - [Publish Quiz with Email Link](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/publish-quiz-email-link/): Share quiz via email.
  - [Publish Quiz with Chat Button](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/publish-quiz-chat-button/): Add quiz as chat button.
  - [Publish on PageFly](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/publish-pagefly/): Integrate quiz with PageFly.
  - [Show a Quiz Based on Shopify Markets](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/show-quiz-based-on-markets/): Display different quizzes for different markets.
  - [Show Quiz in Shop App](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/show-quiz-in-shop-app/): Display in Shop App.
  - [Show Quiz on Customer Profile](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/show-quiz-on-customer-profile/): Customer profile integration.
  - [Show Quiz Only to Logged-In Customers](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/show-quiz-to-logged-in-customers/): Restrict access.
  - [Show Quiz Answers in Orders](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/show-quiz-answers-in-orders/): Display quiz responses in order details.
  - [Redirect Quiz to Another Page](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/redirect-quiz-to-another-page/): Redirect after quiz.
  - [Change Checkout Settings](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/change-checkout-settings/): Checkout configuration.
  - [Restore Quiz Progress](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/restore-quiz-progress/): User experience improvement.
- **Integrations & Data Collection:**
  - [Send Leads to Your CRM](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/send-leads-to-crm/): CRM integration.
  - [Send Leads to Klaviyo](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/send-leads-to-klaviyo/): Klaviyo integration.
  - [Send Leads to HubSpot](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/send-leads-to-hubspot/): HubSpot integration.
  - [Send Leads to Mailchimp](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/send-leads-to-mailchimp/): Mailchimp integration.
  - [Send Leads to Omnisend](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/send-leads-to-omnisend/): Omnisend integration.
  - [Send Leads to ActiveCampaign](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/send-leads-to-activecampaign/): ActiveCampaign integration.
  - [Send Leads to Zapier](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/send-leads-to-zapier/): Zapier integration.
  - [Send Leads to Webhooks](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/send-leads-to-webhooks/): Custom webhook integration.
  - [Send Leads to Shopify Customers](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/send-leads-to-shopify-customers/): Add leads as Shopify customers.
  - [Ask for Marketing Consent](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/ask-for-marketing-consent/): Consent collection.
  - [Use Customer Tags](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/use-customer-tags/): Tagging customers.
  - [Use Custom Fields as Tags](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/use-custom-fields-as-tags/): Convert custom fields to tags.
  - [Integrate Meta Pixel](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/integrate-meta-pixel/): Meta Pixel integration.
  - [Integrate Google Analytics](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/integrate-google-analytics/): Analytics integration.
  - [Send Result Emails](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/send-result-emails/): Email results to users.
  - [Connect SMTP for Email](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/send-result-emails-from-custom-server/): Set up custom SMTP server for emails.
  - [Track Quiz Revenue](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/track-quiz-revenue/): Revenue tracking.
  - [Download Quiz Responses](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/download-quiz-responses/): Export responses.
- **Troubleshooting & Maintenance:**
  - [Fix Viewport Issue on Mobile](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/fix-viewport-issue-on-mobile/): Mobile troubleshooting.
  - [Update Shopify Cart Drawer](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/update-shopify-cart-drawer/): Shopify integration.
  - [Missing Product Images](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/missing-product-images/): Image troubleshooting.
  - [Sync Catalog](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/sync-catalog/): Catalog synchronization.
  - [Sync Selected Collections](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/sync-selected-collections/): Sync specific product collections.
  - [Copy Quiz from One Store to Another](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/copy-the-quiz-from-one-store-to-another/): Copy quizzes between stores.
  - [Check Quiz Loading Speed](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/check-quiz-loading-speed/): Performance optimization.
  - [Products Not Added To Cart](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/add-to-cart-issues/): Troubleshooting add-to-cart issues.
  - [Troubleshoot App Issues for WordPress/WooCommerce](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/troubleshooting-product-recommendation-quiz-app-issues-for-wordpress-woocommerce/): WordPress/WooCommerce troubleshooting.

## App Manual (Reference)
- [App Manual Overview](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/reference/): Reference documentation home.
- [Dashboard](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/reference/dashboard/): Dashboard features.
- [Plans & Pricing](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/reference/plans-pricing/): Subscription details.
- [App Settings](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/reference/app-settings/): Configuration options.
- [CSS Structure](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/reference/css-structure/): CSS customization reference.
- [API Reference](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/reference/api-reference/): API documentation.
- **Quiz Builder:**
  - [Quiz Builder Overview](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/reference/quiz-builder/): Main quiz builder documentation.
  - [Questions](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/reference/quiz-builder/questions/): Managing quiz questions.
  - [Link Collections](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/reference/quiz-builder/link-collections/): Linking collections.
  - [Link Products](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/reference/quiz-builder/link-products/): Linking products.
  - [Customer Tags](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/reference/quiz-builder/customer-tags/): Tagging customers.
  - [Conditional Logic](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/reference/quiz-builder/conditional-logic/): Logic reference.
  - [Quiz Design](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/reference/quiz-builder/quiz-design/): Design settings.
  - [Results Page](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/reference/quiz-builder/results-page/): Results configuration.
  - [Notifications](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/reference/quiz-builder/notifications/): Notification settings.
  - [Quiz Settings](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/reference/quiz-builder/quiz-settings/): Quiz configuration.
  - [Connect / Integrations](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/reference/quiz-builder/connect-integrations/): Integrations setup.
  - [Share / Publish](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/reference/quiz-builder/share-publish/): Sharing and publishing quizzes.
  - [Metrics](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/reference/quiz-builder/metrics/): Analytics and reporting.

## Customer Success
- [Customer Success Home](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/customer-success/): Customer success stories and resources.
- [Plans & Pricing FAQ](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/customer-success/plans-pricing-faq/): Frequently asked questions.
- [Quiz Setup Checklist](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/customer-success/quiz-setup-checklist/): Step-by-step checklist before going live.
- [How to Build a Successful Shop Quiz](https://revenuehunt.com/how-to-build-a-successful-ecommerce-quiz/): Best practices for quiz creation.
- [How to Build a Successful Quiz](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/customer-success/how-to-build-succesful-quiz/): Best practices for quiz creation.
- [How to Get More Quiz Engagement](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/customer-success/how-to-get-more-quiz-engagement/): Easy ways to promote your quiz.
- [How to Reduce Drop Off](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/customer-success/reduce-dropoff/): Reducing quiz abandonment.
- [Quiz Not Converting](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/customer-success/quiz-not-converting/): Conversion troubleshooting.
- [Why Products Are Not Added To Cart](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/customer-success/add-to-cart-issues/): Troubleshooting add-to-cart issues.
- [11 Easy Ways to Promote Your Quiz](https://revenuehunt.com/11-easy-ways-to-promote-your-quiz-and-get-more-people-to-take-it/): Promotion strategies.
- [Build an Effective Sales Funnel](https://revenuehunt.com/build-sales-funnel-shopify-store/): Sales funnel optimization.
- [Build Sales Funnel](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/customer-success/build-sales-funnel/): Sales funnel optimization.
- [Convert Leads to Customers](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/customer-success/convert-leads-to-customers/): Lead conversion strategies.
- [Product Quiz Metrics: What to Track](https://revenuehunt.com/product-quiz-metrics-what-to-track-to-convert-better/): Analytics for better conversion.
- [Track Quiz Metrics for Better Conversions](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/customer-success/track-quiz-metrics-for-better-conversions/): Analytics for better conversion.
- [How to Use Customer Tags in Product Quizzes](https://revenuehunt.com/how-to-use-customer-tags-in-product-quizzes-to-maximize-sales/): Maximizing sales with tags.
- [Use Customer Tags in Quiz](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/customer-success/use-customer-tags-in-quiz/): Maximizing sales with tags.
- [Smart Ways to Ask for Marketing Consent](https://revenuehunt.com/smart-ways-to-ask-for-marketing-data-processing-consent-in-your-product-recommendation-quiz/): Consent best practices.
- [Ask for Marketing Consent](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/customer-success/ask-marketing-consent/): Consent best practices.
- [How to Create a Video Quiz](https://revenuehunt.com/practical-guide-create-a-video-quiz-for-your-e-commerce-website/): Video quiz guide.
- [Why Your Product Quiz is NOT Converting Well](https://revenuehunt.com/why-your-product-quiz-is-not-converting-well/): Conversion troubleshooting.
- [How to Adapt Product Quizzes for Different Markets and Languages](https://revenuehunt.com/how-to-adapt-product-quizzes-for-different-markets-and-languages/): Localization strategies.
- [Adapt Quizzes to Markets](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/customer-success/adapt-quizzes-to-markets/): Localization strategies.
- [Known Bugs & Limitations](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/customer-success/bugs/): Current issues and limitations.
- [Built for Shopify](https://docs.revenuehunt.com/customer-success/built-for-shopify/): version information. 

## Platform-Specific Documentation Files for Custom GPTs

The following files contain complete, platform-specific documentation bundles. Each file combines generic content with platform-specific instructions and includes source URLs for every section. These files are ideal for training Custom GPTs to provide customer support, draft emails, and reference documentation links accurately.

- [Shopify Documentation](https://revenuehunt.com/shopify.txt): Complete platform-specific documentation for Shopify (includes generic content + Shopify-specific instructions). Use this file to train ChatGPT for Shopify customer support.
- [Shopify Legacy Documentation](https://revenuehunt.com/shopify-legacy.txt): Complete platform-specific documentation for Shopify Legacy (includes generic content + legacy-specific instructions). Use this file to train ChatGPT for Shopify Legacy customer support.
- [WooCommerce Documentation](https://revenuehunt.com/woocommerce.txt): Complete platform-specific documentation for WooCommerce (includes generic content + WooCommerce-specific instructions). Use this file to train ChatGPT for WooCommerce customer support.

Each file contains all documentation content with clear source URLs, making it easy to draft support emails and reference the correct documentation links.
